description: In an interview, Iran's vice president echoed the country's president, saying Iran does not want a wider war in the Middle East. His comments came as world leaders gathered for the U.N. General Assembly. NBC News' Andrea Mitchell reports.
title: Iran's new vice president says Iran does not want a wider war

description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu urged civilians in southern Lebanon to evacuate. Hundreds of people were killed by Israeli airstrikes in Lebanon as Israel said it was deepening its attacks against the terrorist organization.
title: Netanyahu tells Lebanon 'Israel's war is not with you' amid Hezbollah clashes

description: A Russian Soyuz capsule landed on the Kazakh steppe bringing two Russian cosmonauts and a U.S. astronaut back to Earth after long stays on the International Space Station.
title: Russian cosmonauts and a U.S. astronaut return to Earth

description: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian said on Monday that Iran does not seek a wider war in the Middle East and that such a conflict would have no winners.
title: Iranian president says he does not want war with Israel

description: Sri Lanka’s leftist leader Anura Kumara Dissanayake took office as president on Monday, promising change in the island nation long led by powerful political families which is emerging from its worst economic crisis in more than seven decades.
title: Marxist-leaning president takes power in Sri Lanka, a country long led by dynasties

description: “Game of Thrones” actor Kristian Nairn, who played the fan favorite character Hodor, sat down with NBC News’ Joe Fryer about his new book, “Beyond the Throne,” a memoir that shares behind-the-scenes stories from the hit show. Nairn also spoke about his passion for music as part of the series, “Flipping the Script.”
title: ‘Game of Thrones’ actor who played Hodor says his memoir offers a behind-the-scenes look at the show

description: Following the release of U.S. pastor David Lin after 18 years in a Chinese prison, the families of other Americans detained in China are stepping up pressure on the Biden administration to secure their freedom. NBC News' Janis Mackey Frayer reports from Beijing.
title: Families of Americans detained in China put pressure on Biden administration

description: A gas explosion in a coal mine in Iran's South Khorasan Province killed dozens of workers and injured many more. Saturday evening's accident was caused by a methane gas explosion in two blocks of the mine, state media said.
title: Dozens of workers killed in Iranian coal mine explosion

description: Princess Kate has made her first public appearance since announcing that she had completed chemotherapy and would be returning to some public duties.
title: Princess Kate makes first public appearance after cancer treatment

description: The Israeli military on Monday warned civilians in southern Lebanon to move away from Hezbollah position and said it was intensifying attacks on its neighbor as the region lurched closer to an all-out war.
title: Israel warns Lebanese civilians to evacuate as it launches 'extensive' strikes across northern border

description: At only 6 years old, Esai Reed has endured three emergency evacuations from orphanages across Haiti as gangs pillage and plunder their way through once peaceful communities.
title: Families from Tennessee to California seek humanitarian parole for adopted children in Haiti

description: Israel said it was carrying out a new wave of airstrikes against alleged Hezbollah targets in the sound of Lebanon after a weekend of exchanges of fire across the border. NBC News' Claudio Lavanga reports for Early Today on the latest escalation in violence.
title: Fears grow of all-out war between Israel and Hezbollah

description: A White House plan to narrow a trade loophole could mean painful times ahead for Chinese sellers on platforms such as Temu and Shein — and higher prices for U.S. consumers. CNBC's Eunice Yoon reports for NBC News from Shenzhen, China.
title: Temu and Shein traders face tougher conditions amid plans to narrow  loophole
